name: Angry Granny! - Haunted Town
description:
Souls are locked in different objects like Secret Potion Bottles, Vase, Dolls, Birds, mouse, books, locked cabinets and chests. You can hide under the bed and inside the cabinets. Every time you release a soul granny knows where you are.

You need to be quiet, there are traps in the haunted city, If you will make some noise by dropping objects Granny will reach you. There might be some doors locked. You have to find keys to unlock them as well.

Features
- Many difficulties to pick
- Enviroment is very dark, you will feel like playing in a night
- Terrifying atmospheric music and sounds
- Fearful and tension atmosphere
- You will feel the terror and fear
- That evil man gives the creeps

So what are you waiting for download now for free.
